title: Proof Attempt Configuration
description: A configuration of a proof attempt

iri.description: The unique identifier for the proof attempt

number.description: The identifying number of the configuration. The number is relative to the ontology

selected_timeout.description: The timeout for the proof attempt (in seconds)

selected_axioms.description: Reference to all axioms selected for this attempt

selected_theorems.description: Reference to all theorems selected for this attempt
